text: @GregAbbott_TX Disgusting. Shame on you.  Why was the National Guard at Riverside Rehabilitation Center today in Austin?  Because all of their patients are COVID19 positive.  Right?  Why don’t we hear about this in the news?  Because you and Trump want to down play the number of cases.
